modShortDescription: This mod makes 7 Days to Die more fun and challenging. Custom Wandering hordes, New Custom Food/Drinks, Added 12 Generated Maps with Combo-pack 47 and more.
modDescription:
This mod makes 7 Days to Die more fun and challenging.

## Features

* HP/Stamina Goes up to 400
* For every level you gain, your game-stage is increased with 2.4 instead of the 1.2 you gain in vanilla.
* The player Starts with 4 Starter Kits
* New list of [zombies](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) and Hostile Animals
* Re-done horde-nights/sleepers/screamer hordes
* Custom Wandering hordes
* The candy is craft-able now (to unlock it you need Master Chef Third perk)
* All the progression Perks Locked with Player Level
* Added new attribute (Advanced Technology)
* New Custom Food/Drinks
* Added High Tier [guns](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) and tools
* Added Research System
* Basic Survival has been shortened to Crafting your Bed-Roll And placing it down
* Added Scrap tier tools and weapons
* Added 12 Generated [Maps](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-maps/) with Combo-pack 47
* Added Stainless steel And Titanium Blocks
* Change Night vision Goggles color from green to red
* Added Higher Tier For heave and Light Armor
* Traders re-stock every 3 days
* Traders Now is destructible and Open all the time
* Added new Ammo and explosive types
* Increased zombie spawn/respawn rate!

**Special thanks to Bdubyah, Xyth, JaxTeller718, KhaineGB, Sirillion, Telric, Mythix, Unforgiven, War3zuk, Bar0th for those great mods:**

* [Bdubs Vehicles](https://7daystodiemods.com/bdubyahs-vehicles-all-in-one/)
* [CCTV](https://7daystodiemods.com/cctvs-mod/)
* [JaxTeller718\_CarRespawner](https://7daystodiemods.com/car-respawner-mod-by-jaxteller718/)
* [KHA19-3SlotForge](https://7daystodiemods.com/3-slot-forge/)
* [KHA19-12CraftQueue](https://7daystodiemods.com/12-slot-crafting-queue/)
* [KHA19-96BBM](https://7daystodiemods.com/bigger-backpack-mod-60-96-slot-with-without-food-water-bar-on-hud/)
* [KHA19-Hornet](https://7daystodiemods.com/return-of-the-hornet/)
* [KHA19-KillTracking](https://7daystodiemods.com/kill-tracking/)
* [KHA19-LockableInvSlots](https://7daystodiemods.com/lockable-inventory-slots/)
* [KHA19-PickupPlants](https://7daystodiemods.com/pick-up-wild-plants-by-pressing-e/)
* [SMXhud](https://7daystodiemods.com/smxhud/)
* SMXlib
* Blood Moon Vehicle Buster
* Scouts Mod
* Wandering Horde GSpatch
* BAR19-GSDifficulity
* [War3zuk Extra Deco Ore](https://7daystodiemods.com/extra-deco-ore/)
* ZMXhudCP
* [ZMXhudCPTHB](https://7daystodiemods.com/zmxhudcpthb/)

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/killerbunny264/Apocalypse-Now-Mod-For-7-Days-To-die/-/archive/main/Apocalypse-Now-Mod-For-7-Days-To-die-main.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/22484-apocalypse-now-mod-a195/).

**Credits:** killerbunny264, Bdubyah, Xyth, JaxTeller718, KhaineGB, Sirillion, Telric, Mythix, Unforgiven, War3zuk, Bar0th
